MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY15 postcode area of Cupar. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9am to complete repairs on broken equipment on our electrical network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:33am on the 2nd of April 2021.
